features: ✿【Soothing & Moisturizing】The hydrating benefits of feminine oil coupled with the omega-6 fatty acids found in safflower yoni essential oil sprays help keep your skin and vaginal moisturized, the yoni essential oil spray is ingredients work together to deeply moisturize, nourish and soften.

✿【Ph Balanced】Different from other feminine hygiene products for women our's yoni oil is natural which we don’t use any harsh chemicals making strawberry body essential oil spray safe to use for all skin types. To help you feel refreshed and smell fabulous, our feminine vaginal oil blend will help promote balanced ph along with leaving behind a subtle refreshing scent.

✿【Improve Yoni Elastivity】This yoni oil is rich in antioxidants and provides effective relief from dryness, itch and mal odor resulting from workouts and menstruation while also promoting skin tone / elasticity and eliminating odor, sweetening your sacred with the fresh and clean fragrance.

✿【Organic Yoni Oil】 For your daily Vaginal health and optimal hygiene needs. The natural yoni wash oil helps maintain Ph levels; deodorizes, soothes skin; ease discomfort, irritation, and itchiness; and keeps your V smelling fresh, and helps with Irregular cycles and menstrual pain.

✿【All For Women】Yoni essential oil for woman is 100% organic, hypoallergenic moisturizer spray that can help combat symptoms of BV, and menopause. The ingredients were carefully selected for their time-tested effectiveness in gently treating feminine issues like vaginal dryness, irritation and itchiness.
body.description: ✿Yoni Essential Oil is a feminine care specially developed to refresh and care for your intimate area every day. It helps to keep the microflora of the skin of your intimate area in a healthy balance by maintaining the natural PH. ✿Usage: Apply 2-3 drops to clean hand and apply to clean female intimate part or apply directly to your panty liner or pad. ✿Features & Benefits You’ll Love: ☞- This hydrating essential oil blend locks the moisture in place helping you feel fresh all day ☞- Promote skin elasticity and reduces visibility of sagging skin and wrinkles ☞- Helps reduce the visibility of signs of aging and promote smoother skin ☞- It can easily be incorporated into your daily care routine without any special preparations

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT INVESTMENT! BUY THIS!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I can already smell the scents before opening the dropler!! Oh my gosh!!! Yes!! I want a prominent scent and the 3 scents are prominent and just not strong but pure scent. Makes you have no leakage nothing makes you also feel warm. I am definitely buying this consistently! This will be my go-to! Plus 3 different events makes it nice to switch off. Very proud of this product great investment. Thank you!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fresh where it matters
reviews.reviewText: I am a big believer in being moisturized. Ive saved my skin and I never thought about a way to keep my bikini area moisturized, in a good way. I discovered yoni oil, and it is a game changer. I apply a little to the exterior areas and it just refreshes the skin, especially after shaving. The oil is light enough to not feel greasy or make me uncomfortable as it absorbs quickly. I like the natural aroma these oils offer and although the scent is mild it makes me feel like Im so fresh like a little flower. Its soothing after any discomfort, for example I am a cyclist and find sometimes I am sore and this just makes me feel better. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell is fabulous
reviews.reviewText: I received this 3 Pack Yoni Essential Oil for Women from Wovarkie as part of a promotion. Here is what I think:1. They came in a padded packet and each bottle was in its own box and each bottle was wrapped in bubble wrap, so the manufacturer was very careful to make sure this item does not get damaged.2. When I opened the outer package, I could smell these without having to even open the boxes.3. The scents were absolutely lovely. I made my husband sniff the bottles, and he did not care for them, but I thought they were great.4. I started with some on the back of my hand to see how strong the scent was going to be. It was not overpowering and seemed to last quite a while.5. Next step was to try it on a panty liner. That worked really, really well.6. Next was to try it on the outer area of my you know what. The oil did not irritate me or cause any problems.7. As for hydration, I can’t really say that I noticed any difference in that area after using it several times.8. The packaging clearly stated that this was for external use only, so I did not go internally with this product.Overall, the smell is great. My preferred method is probably going to be a combination of on the skin and on the liner. That way you get the benefit of both. I just cannot get over the smell. I am literally sitting here still sniffing the bottles in between typing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizes, Nourishes and Softens.
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered the 3 pack of Yoni intimate oil deodorants I wanted to see if it would work better than the intimate deodorant sprays I have tried and been disappointed with. These oils are 100% organic and hypoallergenic. I received 3-3.00 Fl Oz bottles of Mango, Strawberry and Pineapple scented oils. The strawberry scent is strongest of the 3, but they all smell nice. I am pleasantly surprised at how much I like and feel after using these oils. I feel fresh, odor free and more confident. The product page explains the health benefits of using these oils so make sure you read it all. There are 3 ways to use these feminine oils, 1. Put it on your intimate area. 2. Use it directly on the pantyliner. 3. Dilute 1 to 2 drops with warm water to your bath. I have found the best way for me is to put a few drops on my pantyliner, the scent last and I have not had any irritation. I can't say if all the benefits they list work, because I haven't used the product that long. I sure hope they do and I will continue to use this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, but the scent doesn't last terribly long.
reviews.reviewText: When I first got these I was SO excited because they smell so good and make the yoni area smell and feel FANTASTIC. But I was disappointed after realizing that the scent only lasts a couple hours at best. So don't expect any miracles.This might be great for applying shortly before "go time" if you know what I mean, especially if your partner favors sweet fruity tastes and smells. The directions also state that a few drops can be added directly to the bathtub, so I tried that and my bath smelled amazing!All in all this is not a bad product by any means but I do wish the scent lasted longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural Feminine Oil Deodorant With Natural Essential Oils
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice set of gifts for my wife. She is glad to use them. There are three bottles of deodorants in the package with different featured scents of mango, pineapple or strawberry, respectively. We looked at the labels together and found out a list of the nice fragrant oils. A few we can recognize are: sweet almond oil, tea tree oil, rose oil, geranium oil, mint oil, camellia oil, mugwort oil, magnolia oil, clove oil, sea buckthorn oil, angelica oil and more. These bottles are very colorful and the smells are very sweat and strong. There are three recommend way of usage, it is probably easier to apply them on panty liners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These oils have a wonderful scent that keeps my private parts smelling refreshed. The oil doesn’t cause any skin irritations or any allergic reactions for me. The oil is easy to apply and simple to wash off. One drop of this amazing oil and it smells good enough to eat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Trusted Brand For Feminine Deoderant!
reviews.reviewText: I'm already familiar with Yoni's Essential Oil for Women in their orange scent and I absolutely love it. I ordered this 3-pack so I could also try out their strawberry, mango, and pineapple scents. They are all very pleasant-smelling, easy to apply, and don't irritate your sensitive skin areas. The strawberry is now my favorite, but they are all very nice and give a nice subtle fruity scent that lasts for a few hours. I highly recommend giving Yoni a try!
